node.title: Latin Grammys 2021: Complete Nominees List
node.alt: The Colombian artist Camilo leads with 10 Latin Grammy nominations.
node.description: Here are the nominees for the 22nd annual ceremony.
node.content: ["The 22nd annual Latin Grammy Awards will take place Thursday in Las Vegas at the MGM Grand Garden Arena. The ceremony, which honors Latin music released between June 1, 2020 and May 31, 2021, will air live on Univision beginning at 8 p.m. Eastern. (Many awards will be handed out starting at 4 p.m. at a separate event that will be webcast via the Latin Grammys\u2019 Facebook Live and YouTube channel.)", "Roselyn S\u00e1nchez, Ana Brenda Contreras and Carlos Rivera are slated to host the main show. Gloria Estefan, Christina Aguilera, Bad Bunny, Ozuna, Rub\u00e9n Blades and C. Tangana are scheduled to perform.", "The Colombian singer Camilo leads with 10 nominations including for record of the year, Aalbum of the year and song of the year.", "See the full list of nominees below.", "Record of the Year", "\u201cSi Hubieras Querido,\u201d Pablo Albor\u00e1n", "\u201cTodo De Ti,\u201d Rauw Alejandro", "\u201cUn Amor Eterno (Versi\u00f3n Balada),\u201d Marc Anthony", "\u201cA Tu Lado,\u201d Paula Arenas", "\u201cBohemio,\u201d Andr\u00e9s Calamaro and Julio Iglesias", "\u201cVida De Rico,\u201d Camilo", "\u201cSu\u00e9ltame, Bogot\u00e1,\u201d Diamante El\u00e9ctrico", "\u201cAm\u00e9n,\u201d Ricardo Montaner, Mau y Ricky, Camilo and Evaluna Montaner", "\u201cDios As\u00ed Lo Quiso,\u201d Ricardo Montaner and Juan Luis Guerra", "\u201cTe Olvidaste,\u201d C. Tangana and Omar Apollo", "\u201cTalvez,\u201d Caetano Veloso and Tom Veloso", "Album of the Year", "\u201cV\u00e9rtigo,\u201d Pablo Albor\u00e1n", "\u201cMis Amores,\u201d Paula Arenas", "\u201cEl \u00daltimo Tour Del Mundo,\u201d Bad Bunny", "\u201cSalswing!,\u201d Rub\u00e9n Blades y Roberto Delgado & Orquesta", "\u201cMis Manos,\u201d Camilo", "\u201cNana, Tom, Vinicius,\u201d Nana Caymmi", "\u201cPriv\u00e9,\u201d Juan Luis Guerra", "\u201cOrigen,\u201d Juanes", "\u201cUn Canto Por M\u00e9xico, Vol. II,\u201d Natalia Lafourcade", "\u201cEl Madrile\u00f1o,\u201d C. Tangana", "Song of the Year", "\u201cA Tu Lado,\u201d Paula Arenas and Maria Elisa Ayerbe, songwriters (Paula Arenas)", "\u201cA Veces,\u201d Diamante El\u00e9ctrico, songwriters (Diamante El\u00e9ctrico)", "\u201cAgua,\u201d J Balvin, Alejandro Borrero, Jhay Cortez, Kevyn Mauricio Cruz Moreno, Derek Drymon, Mark Harrison, Stephen Hillenburg, Alejandro Ramirez, Ivanni Rodr\u00edguez, Blaise Smith, Tainy and Juan Camilo Vargas, songwriters (Tainy and J Balvin)", "\u201cCanci\u00f3n Bonita,\u201d Rafa Arcaute, Ricky Martin, Mauricio Rengifo, Andr\u00e9s Torres and Carlos Vives, songwriters (Carlos Vives and Ricky Martin)", "\u201cDios As\u00ed Lo Quiso,\u201d Camilo, David Julca, Jonathan Julca, Yasmil Jes\u00fas Marrufo and Ricardo Montaner, songwriters (Ricardo Montaner and Juan Luis Guerra)", "\u201cHaw\u00e1i,\u201d \u00c9dgar Barrera, Ren\u00e9 Cano, Kevyn Cruz, Johan Espinosa, Kevin Jim\u00e9nez, Miky La Sensa, Bryan Lezcano, Maluma, Andr\u00e9s Uribe and Juan Camilo Vargas, songwriters (Maluma)", "\u201cMi Guitarra,\u201d Javier Lim\u00f3n, songwriter (Javier Lim\u00f3n, Juan Luis Guerra and Nella)", "\u201cPatria y Vida,\u201d Descemer Bueno, El Funky, Gente De Zona, Yadam Gonz\u00e1lez, Beatriz Luengo, Maykel Osorbo and Yotuel, songwriters (Yotuel, Gente De Zona, Descemer Bueno, Maykel Osorbo, El Funky)", "\u201cQue Se Sepa Nuestro Amor,\u201d El David Aguilar and Mon Laferte, songwriters (Mon Laferte and Alejandro Fern\u00e1ndez)", "\u201cSi Hubieras Querido,\u201d Pablo Albor\u00e1n, Nicol\u00e1s \u201cNa\u2019vi\u201d De La Espriella, Diana Fuentes and Julio Reyes Copello, songwriters (Pablo Albor\u00e1n)", "\u201cTodo De Ti,\u201d Rauw Alejandro, Jos\u00e9 M. Collazo, Luis J. Gonz\u00e1lez, Rafael E.
